thrikunamala purawasi kamituwe aarambhayema pradhana sabhapathi padawiya, shri lanka yudahamudawe saha nawika hamudawe bauddha sangamaye pradhana anushasaka padawiya aadi boho thanathuruwalata munwahanse pathkaraganna ladde siyalu denagema kamaththa anuwaya.siyam maha nikaye malwathu wihara parshwaye panadura thotamuna sahitha rayigam salpiti dekoralaye pradhana adhikarana sangha nayaka, horana shasanarakshaka bala mandalaye sabhapathi gaurawa shasthrawedi thalagala sumanarathana na himithrikunamala, uppuweli shri dharmawijaya bauddha madhyasthanaya, gomarankadawala rangiriulpatha rajamaha wiharaya kuchchaweli sembil rajamaha wiharaya, kurudugama rajamaha wiharaya, thorayaya dammadawaththa shri sudarshanaramaya, thalapathpitiya shri dharmawijaya bauddha madhyasthanaya yana wiharasthanayanhi adhipathi amarapura siri saddhadhamwansha mahanikaye anunayaka dhurandhara siri sugatha sasanawanshalankara ,winayacharya asarana sarana ahungalle sirisilawisuddhi maha swamindrayan wahanse mahanayaka padawiyen pidum labima agayamin pawathwena samaru uleledi ma subhashinsana paniwidayak nikuth karanu labanne apramana sathutakini.1975 kuda polathu maduwak sadagena rathri kalayagatha kirima sandaha wishala palugasak uda palak idikarawagena kuchchaweli pradeshiya lekam kottashaye athi eladakulama (masan wawa) gana kalawen wasi giya purana rajamaha wiharastha wasiwa thrikunamala disthrikkaye shasana katayuthu aarambha kala unwahanse inpasu sembimaleyi namin prakata kinihiriya kanda purana rajamaha wihasthanaya 1978 kuchchaweli polis sthanaya asala samudragiri pichchamal wiharaya yanadi naganehira palathe thrikunamalaya disthrikkaye walwadi abhawayata ha winashayata pathwemin thibu pauranika wehera wiharasthana prathisanskaranaya karamin nagenahira palatha thula bauddha abhimanaya nawatha naga situwima sandaha amila mehewarak karana bawa apa kawuruth danna karunaki.1985 di thrasthawadin wisin kuchchaweli samudragiri pichchamal wiharaya asala thibu nawika hamuda kadawuratath,polis sthanayatath ella kala thrastha praharayanhidi unwahansege dakunu athata wedi praharayak ella wimen masa gananawak rohalgatha wi prathikara ganimata siduwu athara unwahansege gnyathin saha hithawathun yalith thama gam pradeshayata paminena lesa karana lada illim pasekala suwa wimen pasu, nawathath buddha puthrayeku lesa nobiyawa thrikunamalaya disthrikkaye shasanika saha jathika mehewara digin digatama itukirima ma me awasthawedi gaurawa purwakawa agaya karami.wasara 40 kata aasanna kalayak pararthakamithwaya peradariwa thama wetha paminena asarana duppath janathawa wenuwen maithriya saha karunawen yuthuwa nagenahira palathe sinhala, demala, muslim samagiya athikirimela kapawu pujya ahungalle sirisilawisuddhi maha nayaka swaminwahanseta dirghayushath sidukaragena yanu labana jathika saha shasanika mehewara thawaduratath sarthakawa idiriyata kara gena yamata awashya shakthiyath dhairyayath ha nirogi suwayath labewayi mama prarthana karami.mohan wijewikrama aandukarawara nagenahira palathashri lankawe mewana wita wada wasaya karana bauddha bhikshun wahansela 37512 atharin agraganya thathwayehila giniya haki athi gaurawaniya obawahanseta amarapura saddhammawansha maha nikaye mahanayaka padawiya himiwima pibidena shri lankawe bauddhabhimanayata mahathwu rukulakiyi mama sithami.
